headline: CPS

headline: Inside sales
pros: Some of the people was cool  laid back environment good workers family environment commission is really good if you can sale
cons: Poor training , didn't give you time to learn the product the boss gave us a thick book of rules to learn within 3 days and a robot script  customer wasn't ready to take boss was pushy some of the co workers was all about them no time work . Very 1 turnover rate
